work.description: Due to me deciding to begin studying to become a Fullstack .NET developer I went back to my sales role while being partly on educational leave.

For nearly 3 years I led a team of 5, fostering a collaborative and positive work environment. Managed store profitability, budgets, scheduling, hiring, and meetings. Oversaw inventory management, sales strategies, and overall store operations

As a sales person I specialized in the sale of phones and phone subscriptions, providing customer service and handling customer relations. Where i worked both independently and as part of a team, contributing to and working towards the store's and personal sales goals. Between 2019-2021 I was acting storemanager on a few occations for several months at a time while the ordinary manager was absent due to sick- and parental leave.

courses.title: Emerging Leaders
courses.description: Completed Elgigantens program for prospective managers.
